pageContext.collection_description: Consists of scrapbooks, personal papers and recordings documenting the history of The Three Little Maids featured on the National Barn Dance, Round-Up, Dinnerbell, Musical Journey with Miss Evelyn, Dreamers Bay and Hilltoppers. Also includes scripts, advertisements, fan letters, photographs of WLS performers and binders of songbooks. Sound recordings include home recordings, radio air-checks, instantaneous discs and 78rpms.
